title: Frequently Asked Questions
subTitle: Please contact us if you cannot find an answer to your question.

faqs.question: Can you bill my home insurance?
faqs.answer: We cannot bill your insurance, but we will provide all the documentation that you need to file for reimbursement.

faqs.question: What is included with your free repair estimate?
faqs.answer: All of our estimates include a fully detailed scope of the work to be completed. You will receive a written report with a breakdown of the cost and time estimated for your project.

faqs.question: How will you handle the scheduling of your work orders?
faqs.answer: We communicate with you every step of the way. If we can see that we will not have the work completed by the agreed-upon time, we will reach out to get a new completion date.

faqs.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have all proper licensing and insurance. We would be more than happy to provide further information if requested.
